fullplot: An average school teacher is about to fall into a big depression due to threats and humiliation she gets from schoolers. Nobody of her coworkers is interested in this situation, and they are not going to help. Once, after a horrible fight with one of the students, she gets a real gun. Now everyone is under her control, though the situation is still completely uncontrollable...
plot: Skirt Day is a fascinating psychological study, a socio-critical investigation - and Isabelle Adhani's first film in five years
title: La journèe de la jupe
